title: (x) Sagmeister card - Futura/20th Century {LIFESAVER/Yves}
content: pretty basic, but I don't know ![the card](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000939im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25398.jpg)
author: apocalypso

comments.content:
If it were'nt for the square dot on the i I would have said Futura.   
Tim
How hard would it to make square dots instead of round dots. There are exactly two. I'd agree that its Futura Bold unless I can see a larger sample (meaning paragraphs)

I was actually wondering if there was a cut of Futura that had square dots as it increased in weight or whether it is not Futura but something based very closely on it.   
Tim
Are we talking about the same [Sagmeister](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000939/http:/www.sagmeister.com/work5.html)?
